item.title: Jetpack-Lifecycles
item.author: 513996717@qq.com (dshcao)
item.description: 原理 ReportFragment ProcessLifecycleOwner ActivityInitializationListener LifecycleOwner&LifecycleObserver LifecycleRegistry&Lifecycle LiveData既是观察者也是被观察者 作为观察者可以观察Activity和Fragment的生命周期 通常将LiveData包在

item.title: Jetpack-Room&LiveData&ViewModel详解
item.author: 513996717@qq.com (dshcao)
item.description: Room升级 当数据表结构变化时如何直接修改version会导致数据库数据被清空 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 return Room.databaseBuilder(context, AppDatabase::class.java, "dsh").allowMainThreadQueries().addMigrations(Migration1000To1001()).build() class Migration1000To1001 : Migration(1000, 1001) { override fun migrate(database: SupportSQLiteDatabase) { database.execSQL("alter table user add column vip integer not

item.title: Jetpack-WorkManager详解
item.author: 513996717@qq.com (dshcao)
item.description: 谷歌使用Room数据库保存任务及Alarm来保证 WorkManager是一定会执行的，最小间隔是15min

item.title: Jetpack-CameraX
